name: Panel de Pon
overview: Fancy and exciting puzzle game Mem is Pon! It features simple and simple operation. Move the cursor to the panel and switch left and right It's just fun, but it doesn't stick. Battle mode There is no doubt that it will heat up even more in the mode. The rising screen, the falling obstacles The block is on the verge of panic. Puzzle mode And various amu such as stage clear mode Full of equipment. Pon with the whole family! When let's play.
